query:
SELECT
            COALESCE(SUM(planned), 0) as planned,
            COALESCE(SUM(spent), 0) as spent,
            COALESCE(SUM(carryover), 0) as carryover,
            TRIM(currency) as "currency!"
        FROM budgets
        WHERE month = $1::smallint AND year = $2
        AND ($3::text IS NULL OR currency = $3)
        GROUP BY currency
        LIMIT 1
